review: This isn't the first Apple TV I've bought and won't be the last either. If you've already got any apple products the Apple TV extends their functionality to your tv so you can show photos, YouTube or even mirror your phone screen to show (most) apps. They are still useful even if you don't own Apple products by playing Netflix and other subscription based services. AirPlay is by far the most compelling feature though.
